item.title: Adding a Ring & Amulet Crafting Interface
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Well, I made this for my server with the full help of my generator. The only code I changed in the client was the Button text

Here’s the code for it.

public static void CraftingInterface(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intBasicInterface = addDTab(18300); intBasicInterface.anIntArray240 = new int[55]; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241 = new int[55]; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272 = new int[55]; intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[0] = 18301; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[0] = 17; //Main sprite addSprite(18301, 0, 0, "mainframe"); //Control 18302 (0) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[1] = 18302; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[1] = 425; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[1] = 284; //Label addText(18302, "Not Able C", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18303 (1) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[2] = 18303; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[2] = 475; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[2] = 26; //Close button addCloseButton(18303, "close big", 21, 21, "Close"); //Control 18304 (2) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[3] = 18304; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[3] = 425; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[3] = 244; //Label addText(18304, "Not Able B", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18305 (3) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[4] = 18305; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[4] = 425; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[4] = 204; //Label addText(18305, "Not Able A", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18306 (4) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[5] = 18306; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[5] = 425; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[5] = 84; //Label addText(18306, "Not Able 7", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18307 (5) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[6] = 18307; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[6] = 306; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[6] = 193; //Button addActionButton(18307, 112, 39, "Diamond Amulet", "diamulet"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18308 (6) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[7] = 18308; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[7] = 258; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[7] = 204; //Label addText(18308, "Lvl. 10", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18309 (7) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[8] = 18309; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[8] = 183; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[8] = 204; //Label addText(18309, "Not Able 4", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18310 (8) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[9] = 18310; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[9] = 306; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[9] = 233; //Button addActionButton(18310, 112, 39, "Dragonstone Amulet", "dsamulet"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18311 (9) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[10] = 18311; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[10] = 258; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[10] = 244; //Label addText(18311, "Lvl. 11", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18312 (10) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[11] = 18312; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[11] = 183; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[11] = 244; //Label addText(18312, "Not Able 5", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18313 (11) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[12] = 18313; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[12] = 258; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[12] = 84; //Label addText(18313, "Lvl. 7", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18314 (12) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[13] = 18314; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[13] = 306; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[13] = 153; //Button addActionButton(18314, 112, 39, "Ruby Amulet", "ramulet"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18315 (13) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[14] = 18315; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[14] = 258; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[14] = 164; //Label addText(18315, "Lvl. 9", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18316 (14) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[15] = 18316; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[15] = 183; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[15] = 164; //Label addText(18316, "Not Able 3", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18317 (15) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[16] = 18317; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[16] = 306; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[16] = 113; //Button addActionButton(18317, 112, 39, "Emerald Amulet", "eamulet"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18318 (16) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[17] = 18318; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[17] = 258; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[17] = 124; //Label addText(18318, "Lvl. 8", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18319 (17) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[18] = 18319; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[18] = 183; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[18] = 124; //Label addText(18319, "Not Able 2", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18320 (18) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[19] = 18320; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[19] = 306; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[19] = 73; //Button addActionButton(18320, 112, 39, "Sapphire Amulet", "samulet"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18321 (19) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[20] = 18321; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[20] = 183; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[20] = 84; //Label addText(18321, "Not Able 1", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18322 (20) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[21] = 18322; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[21] = 406; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[21] = 50; //Image addSprite(18322, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18323 (21) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[22] = 18323; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[22] = 65; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[22] = 233; //Button addActionButton(18323, 112, 39, "Dragonstone Ring", "drring"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18324 (22) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[23] = 18324; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[23] = 65; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[23] = 273; //Button addActionButton(18324, 112, 39, "Onyx Ring", "oring"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18325 (23) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[24] = 18325; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[24] = 463; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[24] = 50; //Image addSprite(18325, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18326 (24) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[25] = 18326; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[25] = 442; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[25] = 50; //Image addSprite(18326, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18327 (25) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[26] = 18327; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[26] = 190; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[26] = 50; //Image addSprite(18327, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18328 (26) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[27] = 18328; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[27] = 153; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[27] = 28; //Label addText(18328, "What would you like to craft?", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 18329 (27) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[28] = 18329; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[28] = 334; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[28] = 50; //Image addSprite(18329, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18330 (28) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[29] = 18330; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[29] = 306; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[29] = 273; //Button addActionButton(18330, 112, 39, "Onyx Amulet", "oamulet"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18331 (29) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[30] = 18331; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[30] = 258; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[30] = 284; //Label addText(18331, "Lvl. 12", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18332 (30) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[31] = 18332; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[31] = 183; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[31] = 284; //Label addText(18332, "Not Able 6", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18333 (31) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[32] = 18333; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[32] = 226; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[32] = 50; //Image addSprite(18333, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18334 (32) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[33] = 18334; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[33] = 262; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[33] = 50; //Image addSprite(18334, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18335 (33) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[34] = 18335; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[34] = 298; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[34] = 50; //Image addSprite(18335, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18336 (34) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[35] = 18336; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[35] = 258; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[35] = 56; //Label addText(18336, "Amulets", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 18337 (35) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[36] = 18337; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[36] = 154; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[36] = 50; //Image addSprite(18337, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18338 (36) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[37] = 18338; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[37] = 12; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[37] = 124; //Label addText(18338, "Lvl. 2", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18339 (37) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[38] = 18339; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[38] = 65; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[38] = 113; //Button addActionButton(18339, 112, 39, "Emerald Ring", "ering"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18340 (38) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[39] = 18340; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[39] = 65; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[39] = 153; //Button addActionButton(18340, 112, 39, "Ruby Ring", "rring"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18341 (39) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[40] = 18341; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[40] = 12; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[40] = 164; //Label addText(18341, "Lvl. 3", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18342 (40) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[41] = 18342; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[41] = 12; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[41] = 204; //Label addText(18342, "Lvl. 4", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18343 (41) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[42] = 18343; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[42] = 65; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[42] = 193; //Button addActionButton(18343, 112, 39, "Diamond Ring", "diring"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18344 (42) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[43] = 18344; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[43] = 12; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[43] = 244; //Label addText(18344, "Lvl. 5", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18345 (43) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[44] = 18345; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[44] = 12; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[44] = 84; //Label addText(18345, "Lvl. 1", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18346 (44) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[45] = 18346; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[45] = 65; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[45] = 73; //Button addActionButton(18346, 112, 39, "Sapphire Ring", "sring"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 18347 (45) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[46] = 18347; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[46] = 82; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[46] = 50; //Image addSprite(18347, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18348 (46) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[47] = 18348; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[47] = 10; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[47] = 50; //Image addSprite(18348, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18349 (47) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[48] = 18349; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[48] = 12; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[48] = 56; //Label addText(18349, "Rings", wid, 3, 0xFF9040); //Control 18350 (48) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[49] = 18350; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[49] = 118; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[49] = 50; //Image addSprite(18350, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18351 (49) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[50] = 18351; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[50] = 46; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[50] = 50; //Image addSprite(18351, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18352 (50) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[51] = 18352; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[51] = 12; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[51] = 284; //Label addText(18352, "Lvl. 6", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18353 (51) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[52] = 18353; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[52] = 370; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[52] = 50; //Image addSprite(18353, 0, 0, "STEELBORDER2 0"); //Control 18354 (52) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[53] = 18354; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[53] = 425; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[53] = 124; //Label addText(18354, "Not Able 8", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Control 18355 (53) intBasicInterface.anIntArray240[54] = 18355; intBasicInterface.anIntArray241[54] = 425; intBasicInterface.anIntArray272[54] = 164; //Label addText(18355, "Not Able 9", wid, 1, 0xFF0000); //Added 54 controls. }

Because I’m not all that nice, I’m not going to include the drawing methods or IDs for server-sided stuff. However, I was nice enough to change the text on each label to make it easy to find, and attach the .int file for the Interface Maker (Just remove the " 0" from the end of the sprites in the crafting sprites.rar and work from there ;)).

In the end, with proper server-sided stuff, it looks like this (I did not have it check for gems yet).

CREDITS WOULD BE NICE

~Lin

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a Ring & Amulet Crafting Interface
